page.title: 05Major Local Events
page.content: There are two main events which take place during the year in Cowdenbeath. These are the Civic Week and the Highland Games. The Civic Week is organised by the Civic Week Committee, a branch of the local council. During Civic Week there are activities which go on such as the sports day and primary school football tournaments. The Highland Games is organised by a committee made up of promoters of the games. It is sponsored by firms who pay for the use of the school's facilities and produce prizes for the winners of the day's events. Also this year, only this year, there as been a visit by the Dick Saunders "Way to Life Crusade". This is held in a tent with a 3000 people capacity. It is self financed to represent the Protestant Churches.
